fields.label: Door image
fields.description: Image that will be used for the door. Needs to have a size ratio of 1:1 if you want the left half fit the right half.

fields.label: Background image
fields.description: Image that should appear inside the door. Will be the door's number by default.

fields.label: Content type
fields.description: Content type that shoud optionally pop up when the door is opened.

semantics.label: Behavioural settings
semantics.description: These options will let you override behaviour settings.

fields.label: Autoplay background music
fields.description: If set, the background music will play automatically once the content is opened. Please note: Some browsers' media policy may prevent autoplay.

fields.label: Let it snow
fields.description: Will add some snow falling in front of the calendar. It never rains in Southern California, it never snows on IE11.

fields.label: Door image template
fields.description: If an image is set, it will be used for every door unless a specific door image is set for a single door.

fields.label: Random order
fields.description: Shuffle the order of the doors. If the "save content state" option is set in the H5P settings, that order will stay the same when the user returns later.

fields.label: Keep order of images
fields.description: Shuffle doors, but keep the door cover images at their fixed positions starting with 1 in the upper left corner down to 24 in the lower right corner.

fields.label: Design mode
fields.description: When in design mode, all doors can be opened. Otherwise, the doors can only be opened in December on and after the respective day indicated by the door number.

fields.label: Nothing to see
fields.default: There is nothing to see here! 🎄

fields.label: Locked
fields.default: Locked. It is not time to open this one yet.

fields.description: Announce the content. @door is a variable and will be replaced with the related door description.
